overview: The only documentary film in Stanislaw Bareja's career. He cast Bobek Kobiela in the lead role (a phrase from the closing credits) and... the Masurian Lakes. A Little Sunshine has Bareja's typical humor, which was fully revealed in the director's feature-length films. The documentary film form was not meant for him, but I guess there is nothing to regret.
title: A Little Sunshine
